portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Personal projects, jobs and collaborations
portfolio.miAdminUsuarios: Web application for dashboard-type systems. Built with Laravel 9 and based on the Bulma Admin Dashboard HTML template.
portfolio.gedezmp: Web application that allows you to create a file with a .zmp extension from a .csv file. The resulting .zmp file can be used to execute batch operations, via terminal, on Zimbra mail servers.
portfolio.SCBmkAdmin: Template for dashboard-type web applications. Built with CodeIgniter 4 and the Bootstrap SB Admin 2 template.

whoami.title: About Me
whoami.subtitle: Human Being
whoami.aboutLine1: Self-taught professional graduated from the Instituto Pedagógico de Caracas of the Universidad Pedagógica Experimental Libertador (UPEL-IPC, Venezuela) as a Computer Science Professor.
whoami.aboutLine2: I practiced the teaching career about 4 years, later I dedicated myself entirely to programming and web development.
whoami.aboutLine3: I currently work as Systems Analyst and Full Stack Web Developer at FOGADE.
